message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.CL 

This paper deals with recommendation systems, which is a topic that falls under several sub-categories in computer science. The most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), as the paper proposes an adaptive clustering technique for content recommendation based on exploration-exploitation strategies in contextual multi-armed bandit settings. The paper also deals with information retrieval (cs.IR) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI), as it aims to improve the prediction performance of recommendation systems. Additionally, the paper deals with social and information networks (cs.SI) and computational linguistics (cs.CL), as it takes into account the collaborative effects that arise due to the interaction of the users with the items.
